title: Installing nginx
content:
1) login to vps

2) Run "apk add nginx" and wait when it will install.

3) When its installed, go to /etc/nginx/sites-enabled and run nano default.

4) You will find listen 80 default server;
listen [::]:80 default server;
Now change 80 to your forwarded port.
Get forwarded port in /forward, or i will do tutorial soon about it theme

Now scroll down and find servername ; change _ to 45.140.142.112:your-forwarded-port

5) Save the config.

6) Run systemctl restart nginx.
7) Done! now upload your site to /var/www/html.
